title: The Butler
creator_credit: Anna Kannava, John Cruthers and Huzzah Productions
brief_description: An intimate portrait of a Greek family and their experience of migration and integration into Australian life. Nino, the youngest, is the vehicle used to explore the alienation and shock that are part of migration, the complexity of family relationships and the integration of the intellectually disabled into the community. “The Butler” is the sequel to “Ten years after, ten years older” also held in the collection.
